'desc': [u'

Organic Surge Moisture Boost Conditioner For Dry or Frizzy Hair (200 ml) Price: Rs.625

If excessive heat styling or just a general exposure to the elements has damaged your hair
column17: you are in the right place. Provide an infusion of moisture to dry hair that lacks shine and bring it back to looking naturally glossy again with Organic Surge Moisture Boost Conditioner For Dry or Frizzy Hair. Formulated using natural ingredients
column18:
this Organic Surge Conditioner is designed to suit both men and women.

The grapeseed oil is a natural emollient that smoothes hair while antioxidant Vitamin E protects from environmental damage. This Moisture Boost Conditioner also contains seaweed extracts that is full of proteins and minerals to nourish your hair from root to tip and wheat protein to improve moisture retention and provide gloss. The glycerine content in the Moisture Boost Conditioner attracts moisture to your hair keeping it constantly hydrated. This Organic Surge Conditioner is also 100% silicone free and untouched by harmful chemicals. Re hydrate and moisturize your hair the safe way with Organic Surge Moisture Boost Conditioner and leave it feeling soft and conditioned.

Directions for Use

  • Apply the required amount of Organic Surge Moisture Boost Conditioner through the lengths of your wet hair.
  • Thoroughly rinse off.
